intro: Smash, survive, evolve — fight through endless waves of chaos.
description:
Megabonk Smash is a fast-paced pixel roguelike action game where you battle endless waves of enemies, collect glowing crystals, upgrade your abilities, and face brutal bosses in an isolated arena of chaos. You awaken on a forgotten pixel island, surrounded by monsters born from crystal insanity. Every second counts — crush enemies, evolve your powers, and survive until the boss appears. Win, or restart the nightmare.

Features:
- Intense Arena Combat – Slash, blast, and burn through hordes using melee, ranged, and fireball attacks.
- Progression and Upgrades – Level up, collect experience crystals, and unlock random skills and perks each run.
- Adaptive Enemies & Boss Fights – Smart foes hunt you down, and powerful bosses test your survival instincts.
- Interactive Pixel World – Explore a handcrafted arena with destructible objects, secrets, and dynamic lighting.
- Retro Aesthetics & Sound – Enjoy classic pixel art visuals, cinematic effects, and immersive sound design.

You are a mysterious warrior trapped on a cursed pixel island — a realm consumed by crystal madness. Each wave pushes you closer to the edge. Gather shards, evolve your strength, and defeat the ancient boss to escape alive. Survive. Evolve. Smash everything.
